completed_steps.summary: Classified as monolith with 1 part: Next.js web app with multiple modules (client-hub, practice-hub, proposal-hub, social-hub, admin, client-portal, client-admin)
Found 66 existing docs: Architecture (5), Guides (6), Reference (6), Operations (5), Development (7), Testing (5), Modules (5), plus pricing research
Technology stack analyzed: Next.js 15, 114 tables/views, 44 tRPC routers, 100+ components
Generated bmm-brownfield-architecture.md - comprehensive system documentation with launch checklists
Generated bmm-index.md - AI-optimized master index consolidating all documentation

findings.project_classification: Monolith - Next.js 15 web application with TypeScript, tRPC, PostgreSQL
